title: Instructional Design for Flexibility and Persistence Enhancement in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics fundamentals and calculus basics
context.additional_context: Personalized mobile content delivery and small-group discussion-based feedback system operation

learning_goals: Learners achieve a target attainment rate of 80% or higher in formative assessments and adhere to weekly learning plans at least 70% of the time.
Learners revise their learning strategies at least once every two weeks using the feedback system within the mobile platform.
Learners secure at least 15 hours of self-directed learning time per week using time management tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
